body.name: Travel Mini Steam Iron for Clothes with 8 Presetting Modes, Portable Iron Steamer Dry and Wet Ironing All in One, Small Handheld Garment Steamer 10s Fast Heat up (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: 【8 Presetting Temperatures】 With the useful digital screen feature, you can easily select your fabric type and always iron with the right heat. Our portable mini ironing machine will provide you with ideal temperatures and vapor for every type of fabric including cotton, wool, silk, linen, polyester, nylon and much more. Just click the button to your preferred mode.

【10s Rapid Heating Up，Powerful Steam Burst】Powered by 1200 watts, this small clothes steam iron fast heats up in 10 seconds once plug in power. Tight seal 100ml/3.4 ounce large water tank hold sufficient amount of water for continuously working 6-8 minutes, refreshing entire shirt without refill. Powerful steam effectively soften clothing fibers, remove winkles and stubborn crisp creases. Works for a voltage of 110v, meets American standards.

【Foldable＆Compact for Travel】One-piece design，weighs only 1 pound，travel bag included，the portable steam iron is very accessible at any time any where you want to iron. Only with an adapter, you can store it in your backpack and take it overseas. Suitable for home, office and business travel.

【Updated Non Stick Alumina Soleplate】The enhanced Alumina soleplate of this comapct iron steamer is more scratch resistant than Teflon and stainless steel, conducts heat quickly and evenly. It doesn’t accumulate dust and is easy to clean, ensures a smooth glide across fabric to efficiently remove wrinkles, better protecting your clothes and for a long lasting performance.

【Safe and Mighty】A slip resistant base is equipped as a safe place to rest the hot household iron in heating up time or during an ironing project, preventing burns and scorching of fabrics. High working Temperature:120℃-165℃（248℉-329℉），fits for most fabics, including synthetics, silk/wool, and cotton. The detailer tip easily presses cuffs, collars, pockets, pleats and in between layers of fabric. Performs well in sewing,quilting and other crafting projects.

【What you get】Travel steam iron with 65 inch cord*1, standing base*1, 100ml measuring cup*1, storage bag*1, manual*1. Well packaged compact steam iron is a good choice for birthday and Christmas and anniversaries gift to your family or lover. If you have any problem with this steam iron, please feel free to contact with us. We will solve it as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to take on a trip for some dress clothes. It worked way better than I expected. Very easy to use, and had a very powerful steam. It has been a long time since I used a steamer, but this by far is the best one for travel that I have every used. Fantastic purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but effective
reviews.reviewText: This is a really handy little iron/steamer. It is light weight and compact. It has a thoughtful design in that the handle swings out of the way so you can fill the water chamber easily.The plate that comes in contact with the clothes is SLICK -- so no sticking and slides easily without bunching.I love the power indicator that shows what power level is associated with each type of fabric. It also heats up very quickly which is great if you just want to do a quick touch up.I tend to not iron as much as I should because it is a hassle dealing with my full-sized iron etc. But with this, it really doesn't slow you down and your clothes look presentable in very short order! Really love it for small quick jobs when you are in a hurry. And I also like the grey -- nice color change from plain old white![LCVR]

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Home Approved
reviews.reviewText: This steaming iron works very well for it size. It fit perfect in my bag when traveling and really does get the wrinkles out of all the garments I have used it on so far. I love that it doesn’t take up a lot of space and is easy to store. Also it is very light so you don’t have to worry about it adding pounds to your luggage doing travel. I let my photographer friend borrow to use in his back drops and he didn’t want to return. It got everything nice and straight and was so compact that he packed it with the rest of his equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I had an item extremely wrinkled and although i have never used steamer at home i ordered this product. Gets hot very quickly and provides good amount of steam. Used it even for underwear and other thins shirts i have and made them look smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Irons well with a couple of cons
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciated the concept of this steam iron. It indeed does produce a good amount of steam and irons out wrinkles very well. I tried it without starch and it did the job with ease. Two issues I had was that you only get about 5 minutes ironing time before you have to refill with water, which won't be a bother if you're ironing one piece of clothing. Also, every time I refilled the water, it spilled over because there's no real way to know how much water is enough until it's spilling out. I tried to pour super slow and stare at the hole to see the level rise but still wasn't able to catch it before it spilled over. There's a small window on the outside of the iron but I don't know what it's for because it doesn't show you the water level. Also of note, the iron makes a loud clicking sound when it's time to fill it back up with water which could be avoided if the window showed how much water was left, giving an indication of when to refill it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hate pulling out my iron for everything so I decided to give this a try and I’m blown away. It heats up really quickly and I love how it had different settings depending on the fabric. So easy to use and doesn’t take much time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little clothing iron is so cute and functional! I rarely used my old bulky clothes iron and it was always a pain to store. This one comes with a little pouch and is so much more attractive without sacrificing functionality too much. It works well on the few occasions I need it to.I'd recommend this to others looking for something a little smaller or more portable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works better than expected. It heats up quick. Very easy to fill and use.
